programme.title: Archy: Built for Speed, Born to Ride
programme.desc: Archys story is one of survival through surf stardom at an early age, fame, drugs, alcohol, sponsorships and the surf rock star lifestyle. Compelling interviews, and explosive surf action from the 80s, 90s, 2000s and beyond.

programme.title: Blissful Surfing
programme.desc: Blissful Surfing has awesome action sequences with great surfers in perfect waves. The surfing by John John Florence, Italo and Bobby Martinez is fantastic. The Blissful Surfing vibe is one of supreme happiness and contentment.

programme.title: Discovering Mavericks
programme.desc: This is the story of those who risked their lives, some paying the ultimate price, for the ultimate ride. Executive produced by Mavericks legend Jeff Clark and directed by Joshua Pomer. Winner of the Newport Beach Film Festival 2013 Audience Award.

programme.title: Cluster
programme.desc: This is our bookmark. Our full stop. It is an actual document of individuality and modern surfing and living and romping and laughing. Collect it and recollect on it. Here we are now, entertain us. And well take it from there.

programme.title: Fish: The Surfboard Documentary
programme.desc: Fish: the Surfboard Documentary, covers the impact the fish surfboard made on surf culture. A deep look at the origin and impact of the Fish Surfboard design and how it would influence surf culture 30 years later. - A look at what happens when a creative San Diego surfer invents a board with a brand-new shape, and the whole surfing world hops aboard for the ride. THE FISH SURFBOARD DESIGN was created by Steve Lis in the San Diego Cliffs area in 1967, and became HUGELY popular in the 1990's.

programme.title: Forbidden Trim
programme.desc: A Marine is sent on a secret mission to Central America. He is seeking intel on a commando syndicate hiding out in the forbidden jungle. He encounters wild animals, a mystical guru, and a group of surfers who help complete is objectives.

programme.title: FULL SPEED
programme.desc: FULL SPEED will get any surfer amped to go surfing! Witness the hottest surfing on the planet. Sure to raise any surfer's heartbeat and peak their STOKE levels!

programme.title: Isolated
programme.desc: Five world class surfers travel to New Guinea in search of undiscovered waves, but end up discovering so much more.

programme.title: Empire of Surf
programme.desc: Be on the inside of how these parks and tech are put together.

programme.title: Noah: The Art of Surfing
programme.desc: Professional surfer Noah Beschen travels to Western Australia and Tahiti alongside filmmaker Andy Woodward to surf beautiful yet powerful waves before returning home to the North Shore of Oahu.

programme.title: Caveheart
programme.desc: Mason Ho takes his faithful companion far from their home in Hawaii and into foreign frigid waters in search for medieval liquid caves.

programme.title: Beyond the Green Veil
programme.desc: Beyond the Green Veil unveils how logging shapes access as surfers and skiers rethink conservation.

programme.title: Go Easy on the Zambezi
programme.desc: Take It Easy On The Zambezi, featuring Mikey February, Dylan Graves, and Harry Bryant, on what Graves calls the biggest adventure he's ever taken in search of surf, deep into the heart of Sub-Saharan Africa.

programme.title: Heavy Water
programme.desc: Heavy Water is a Michael Oblowitz film, produced by Red Bull Media House and All Edge Entertainment, that follows the life and times of Nathan Fletcher, part of the royal family of surfing and a key figure in big wave history.

programme.title: And Two If By Sea
programme.desc: The story of iconic professional surfers and identical twins CJ & Damien Hobgood. Their sibling rivalry and struggle to each establish their own identity fueled their careers, but ripped their personal and peripheral relationships apart.

programme.title: Andy Irons and The Radicals
programme.desc: This is a film about Andy Irons surfing life, the progressive pioneers who influenced him, the prodigious teenage peers who pushed him, and how his surfing has inspired a generation since.

programme.title: Step into Liquid
programme.desc: Zigzagging from the waters off Ireland to Oahu's ripping North Shore, this documentary profiles the diverse and fascinating characters who have devoted their lives to catching the perfect wave.

programme.title: Dirty Old Wedge
programme.desc: Dirty Old Wedge is the real life story of the world's most infamous shorebreak and those who live it

programme.title: All Tha Way Live
programme.desc: From beaches to streets, All Tha Way Live takes you on a journey with some of the planet's best surfers.

programme.title: Arc of Aleutia
programme.desc: How far would you go, and what would you endure to surf alone? On this search, the journey often consumes the destination when the magnitude of the adventure overwhelms us.
